title: How  Can I Send a Multimedia Message to Several Recipients?
answer: When editing a multimedia message, highlight Recipient, and then select Option > Edit > Add number. You can select Search to add a phone number from the phonebook and then select Select, or enter a phone number directly and then select Ok. Repeat the operation of adding a number to add other numbers (a maximum of 20 numbers can be added). Then return to the message editing screen. After editing the multimedia message, select Send by pressing the left soft key to send the message.
